title: Palestinian security forces set up checkpoints outside major ... - Reddit
body: 34M subscribers in the worldnews community. A place for major news from around the world, excluding US-internal news.
readable_content:
- RoiMan (2015-02-23): If you need to prevent your teachers from attending one of these voilent "demonstartions", you know your society is fucked.
- Computer_Name (2015-02-23): Really don't think you should be encouraging people to treat Maan as a legitimate source of information
- [deleted] (2015-02-23): Wanted to see how Reddit would react to Palestinian checkpoints.
Silence, as expected.
